title: Maker Space Coordinator at Unleash Space
description: As the Maker Space Coordinator I run and maintain the space as well as manage a team of 15 Creative Technologists. I also consult with students and staff members to create and design a wide range projects using the latest technologies. Some of the technologies I work with in this role are 3D printing, laser cutting, 5G, VR/AR, soldering and CNC routing.

title: Fullstack developer and designer at Kekeno Tech
description: At Kekeno Tech I am a fullstack developer and designer working mainly to create web applications for clients around New Zealand. The primary technologies used for this role is Angular , Flask and Firebase . On top of this I also often design webpages or modify existing designs to fit the needs of the client.

title: Software at Halter
description: At Halter I am working on the mobile app making it easy and intuitive for users to interact with their cows and bring farming into the future. This involves working with various teams to optimise the moooovement of cows
